column1: <section class="featured featured-4 featured-left pt-60 pb-60" id="featured4">
As a fast-growing Analytics Consulting Firm
column2: we specialize in leveraging analytics for strategic decision making
column3: we offer end-to-end solutions to clients across various industrial sectors. At dhiOmics
column4: our objective is to bring together the best combination of analysts and consultants to complement our clients with a shared need to discover and build those capabilities and drive continuous market excellence.

dhiOmics helped us in implementing Big data Solution and Big Data Analytics. Very few companies posses mix of Business Sense with knowledge of Statistics
column2: Technology. dhiOmics have proved themselves in all these three areas.

column1: Nilesh and his team are advanced analytics wizards! We definitely look forward to engaging with dhiOmics for our analytical requirements. I highly recommend dhiOmics Analytics!
Lead - MIUI Business at Xiaomi Technology
dhiOmics has been a great partner to solve various business problems across merchandising teams. Their can-do attitude
column3: the mix of experience really helped us. I wish a bright future to dhiOmics and would like to partner with them for more interesting business problems.

column1: Director - Business Insights at Myntra Jabong

We provide technology and technology without Analytics is of no use. dhiOmics is our analytics arm. They are our permanent partners. The best thing about the team is their ability to understand the business and solving problems under deadline.
dhiOmics helped us on various business problems using advanced analytics. Few things which really stood out is their team's commitment
column2: energy to deliver and solve problem. That was wonderful and sets them apart from other companies.
